titleStmt.title: The history of the government of France, under the administration of the great Armand du Plessis, Cardinall and Duke of Richlieu, and chief minister of state in that kingdome wherein occur many important negotiations relating to most part of Christendome in his time : with politique observations upon the chapters / translated out of French by J.D. Esq.
Histoire du ministere d'Armand Jean du Plessis, cardinal duc de Richelieu, sous le regne de Louis le Juste, XIII, du nom, roy de France et de Navarre. English
titleStmt.author: Vialart, Charles, d. 1644.
J. D. (John Dodington)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Macock, for Joshua Kirton ..., and are to be sold at the Kings Arms ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of Histoire du ministere d'Armand Jean du Plessis, cardinal duc de Richelieu, sous le regne de Louis le Juste, XIII, du nom roy de France et de Navarre.
The original was condemned to be burned by order of the Parliament of Paris, May 11, 1650.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
